snippet.title: The Last Faith - Official Release Month Trailer | Future Games Show 2023
snippet.description: The Last Faith will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One in October 2023. Dive into the dark gothic world of The Last Faith in this latest trailer for the upcoming Metroidvania and Soulslike game. The trailer also showcases various terrifying enemies and bosses you'll encounter, gives a peek at the story, and more. A limited beta for The Last Faith will run for a week later this summer on Steam, and registration is open now.
